#
# pip install -r spot_pip_requirements.txt
#
# NOTE: these are only needed if you want to use NAOJ features
#       e.g. loading OPE files, checking Subaru instrument FOV, etc.
#

# NAOJ packages
naojutils @ git+http://github.com/naojsoft/naojutils
oscript @ git+http://github.com/naojsoft/oscript
g2cam @ git+http://github.com/naojsoft/g2cam
